This has two sides—the pro being that you are frequently exposed to different leadership styles, thus preventing you from becoming complacent in your role. They are closed 3 holidays each year, I have previously only had 1 guaranteed holiday at other retailers. This would have been a con, but they have started rolling out an improvement.
